body: A Forge includes a hearth, an anvil, a slack tub, metalworking tools, and other appropriate materials for shaping iron and other metals. A Forge counts as artisan's tools for up to three people working on metalworking skills such as Craft (armor) and Craft (weapons).
name: Forge
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Rooms And Teams/Rooms and Teams/Rooms/Forge
benefit: counts as masterwork artisan's tools for smithing skills
